CustomField.description: The start mode determines the behavior around automatic activation of the widget. Activation here means the challenge gets requested and gets solved.
CustomField.label: StartMode

value.label: Auto
value.description: The widget gets activated as soon as it is created.

value.label: Focus
value.description: The widget gets activated as soon as the form above it is focused.

value.label: None
value.description: The widget does not start automatically at all; the user needs to press the widget.
